name: Level Design Work
description:
For our courses, we were asked to develop a game using Gdevelop and show our level design skills.

I wanted to create the mechanics from scratch so I made everything from 0 with Unity.

The objective was to create an interesting level and have a form and feedback from playtesters.

The actual goal was the playtest part.

Here's the playtest form and thanks in advance for filling it and helping me become a better level designer and game designer!

PlayTest Questions

I hope you have fun and comment how many coins you got!
